subpanels.description: Head in ventral view of Squalus melanurus Fourmanoir, 1979. MNHN-IC-1997-3619, juvenile female, 527 mm TL. Scale bar: 50 mm.
Head in ventral view of Squalus melanurus Fourmanoir, 1979. MNHN-IC-1980-0460 (holotype of S. melanurus), adult male, 670 mm TL. Scale bar: 50 mm.
Head in ventral view of Squalus melanurus Fourmanoir, 1979. MNHN-IC-1978-0693 (holotype of S. rancureli Fourmanoir, 1979), adult male, 680 mm TL. Scale bar: 50 mm.
